Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash when the Info button and 10-Codes buttons were pressed on on the player screen.
Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash when the Info button and 10-Codes buttons were pressed on on the player screen.

- Fixed a bug which prevented the configuring and receiving of push notifications (you'll need to re-enable them to continue to receive notifications).
- Fixed a bug which prevented the "Near Me" button from working.
- Fixed a bug which prevented the searching of scanners within x miles of your location.
- Fixed a bug related to the displaying of channel information on the player screen.
- Fixed a bug related to the displaying of Broadcastify alerts in directory listings.

Changed default listener alert threshold from 1000 to 3500.

This update fixes some bugs and adds the ability to copy the app's ID (useful when contacting support)
Bug fixes

In this update I've redesigned the app navigation making it easier to get to things like your favorite scanners, browsing and viewing breaking news.

Stay tuned for more exciting updates in the works!

• Improvements to the interface
• Dedicated volume control on the now playing screen
• Improved 10-codes
• Bug fixes
Changed default listener alert threshold from 1000 to 3500.

Happy New Year!

This update includes a lot of cleanup work in preparation for more regular updates.

• Added support for all screen sizes including iPhone XS, Max and iPad Pro!
• Updated app icon

• Removed those loading alerts whenever you tap something. 
• Favorites are now stored locally so they load instantly
• Tapping the icons next to the volume slider now sets it to mute or max volume
• Improved some empty state screens
• Simplified the configure alerts screens

• Balance control is finally here! You can now switch between left & right audio channels. (Only available on dual channel scanners)
• You can now share the scanner you're listening to with others via Facebook, Twitter and more.
• A description of the scanner stream is now displayed on the player page (when available) 
• The sleep timer icon now turns orange when it's active so you know when it's enabled
• General UI enhancements
• Bug fixes

We're excited to share with you some cool new Pro features!

• Themes: Pick from a variety of colorful themes including dark mode
• Auto-Dark Mode: Automatically turns on dark mode at night
• Today extensions: View your favorites and recent alerts from your widgets screen
• Lock screen control: Play/pause from the lock screen without having to open the app

• 10-codes are now dark themed so your eyes don't bleed when you open it at night
• The now playing screen now shows breaking news info if there is a major event reported by Broadcastify
• The sleep timer is redesigned to be easier to use
• Bug fixes

This update includes lots of improvements to the alerts.
- Now you can receive Broadcastify alerts for scanners near you
- You can now receive alerts when new scanners are added near you
- The existing Alert configurations have been moved into the settings tab under "Alert Settings"

The "News" tab is now more simple showing a chronological list of live and past events.

Introducing CarPlay support!

Now you can listen to your favorite, popular, nearby, or breaking news scanners while driving!

- In this update, we've fixed some general issues with CarPlay.
- We also added an Audio mixing setting so you can stream scanner at the same time as other audio apps. To enable this go to settings > advanced > Audio mixing.
- Lots of bug fixes.

- In this update, we've fixed some general issues with CarPlay.
- We also added an Audio mixing setting so you can stream scanner at the same time as other audio apps. To enable this go to settings > advanced > Audio mixing.
- Lots of bug fixes.

Have you ever opened a trending feed but don't know what's currently happening?
Well now anyone can report things like protests, fires, shootings right from the player page! Reporting events helps others know what's happening.

• You can now pick which page should open by default when opening Scanner Radio.
To enable this, go to Settings > Advanced > Default Screen on Launch
• Notifications now say what's happening on a feed (when available)
• The protest icon within user reports has been changed.

New widgets are here!
You can now add 3 widgets to your home screen so you can quickly jump to your favorite feed or see when breaking news is is happening. 

To add a widget, long press on your home screen and tap "+" and scroll down to Scanner Radio.
